entry.title: The Dopp Kit in Matcha Green
entry.summary:
Vendor: Beach House Group
Type: Cosmetic & Toiletry Bags
Price: 48.00

Description

A spill-proof bag for all the bottles, tubes, jars and sprays your getting-ready routine requires. What we love most about this kit—besides its pair of organizational compartments—is the clever loop to hang from towel hooks so you can keep all your lotions and potions from falling off that tiny hotel vanity situation.

 
Shay's Inspo

“Guys, say goodbye to plastic sandwich bags to stash your toiletries—I got you covered!” — Shay
Details

WATER-RESISTANT LINING
Keeps what’s inside nice and dry.
2 ZIP COMPARTMENTS
Neat freaks, rejoice.
ADJUSTABLE LOOP HANDLE
It loves to hang out.
2 INTERIOR POCKETS
Keep your toothbrush clean.
WIRE-FRAMED
No shape-shifting.

entry.title: The Cosmetic Pouch Set in Natural
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: the cosmetic pouch set
Price: 24.00

Description

You're way too organized, said no one ever! This simple set of pouches can organize just about anything from your day to day needs to your travel essentials, keeping everything zipped up and tidy in two compact pieces!
Shay's Inspo
“I can never have to many little pouches and kits to organize all my stuff. I love having a pouch for everything, one for the car, one for my gym bag, one for my work tote – this makes me feel like I am constantly prepared for anything ” —Shay
Details

2 PIECE SET
Because one is never enough
OVERSIZED LOGO
Only making BIG statements around here
ORGANIZED COMPARTMENTS
A place for everything

entry.title: The Cosmetic Case in Sakura Pink
entry.summary:
Vendor: Beach House Group
Type: Cosmetic & Toiletry Bags
Price: 58.00

Description

We made this spill-proof cosmetic case so every makeup-lover can stay super organized wherever they bring their beauty rituals. Far away from home? No worries—comes with a mirror for en route touch-ups! And you won’t have to leave any of your favorite products behind because this makeup case has PLENTY of storage. Plus a removable brush holder that pops out (because no one wants to flip back and forth between cheeks and lips). Translation: nail your eye makeup wherever you roam.
Shay's Inspo

“I wanted makeup bags that could be opened with ease so all the girls will be like ‘BAM BAM BAM here’s all my stuff, I’m ready to get ready.” —Shay
Details

EASY MAKEUP STORAGE
WATER-RESISTANT LINING
Keeps what’s inside nice and dry.
COMPACT MIRROR INCLUDED
Touch up when you touch down.
DOUBLE-SIDED BRUSH HOLDER
Keep your tools tidy.
EASY-TO-CLEAN
We call it oops-proof.

entry.title: The Hanging Cosmetic Case in Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 58.00

Description

This well-groomed cosmetic case is a spill-proof protector for your most valuable assets, your skin care and beauty products! Made for the traveler who prefers to take their entire routine with them, no one should have to compromise their skincare regimen, keeping every last essential organized and hanging at your fingertips! Made of durable nylon with a handle to easily tote it around. A useful TSA compliant clear to-go pouch makes carry-on life a breeze. Consider your travel beauty routine handled!
Specifications

Dims: 9.75 x 7.25 x 6.5
Materials:Body - Nylon Twill, Trim - Vegan Buffalo Leather, Lining - Poly w/ Water resistant protective finish, Hardware - Brushed Gold and Matte Black, Pouch - Clear TPU, Zippers Nylon Coil
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 1.14lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
- Easy to carry top handle with BÉIS logo
- Double U-zip open/closure
- Easy to wipe clean nylon fabric

INTERIOR
- Easy to wipe clean, durable, lining with stain resistant finish
- Removable "To Go" clear zip pouch
- Clear zip pocket
- 2 small mesh elasticized pockets
- 1 large mesh elasticized pocket
- Hidden hanger

PERFECT FOR
-Cosmetics
-Skin Care
-Toiletries
-Makeup Brushes
-All the Hair Ties
-Make-Up Artist

STANDS UP
For hands free application.

entry.title: The Dopp Kit in Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Beach House Group
Type: Cosmetic & Toiletry Bags
Price: 48.00

Description

A spill-proof bag for all the bottles, tubes, jars and sprays your getting-ready routine requires. What we love most about this kit—besides its pair of organizational compartments—is the clever loop to hang from towel hooks so you can keep all your lotions and potions from falling off that tiny hotel vanity situation.

 
Specifications

Dims: 6.5"H x 9"W x 6"D
Materials:
Body: Cotton/Jute Canvas (beige) or Poly Canvas (black), PU
Trim - nylon zippers
Lining - water resistant poly lining
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 0.88lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
- wire frame double zip opening/closure - opens wide to see inside
- double zip around bottom compartment
INTERIOR
- water resistant lining in bottom compartment
- special pocket just for keeping your toothbrush/tooth care clean
- easy to wipe clean, durable lining
PERFECT FOR
-Lotions + Potions
-Beauty Routines
-Bits + Baubles

entry.title: The Cosmetic Case in Beige
entry.summary:
Vendor: Beach House Group
Type: Cosmetic & Toiletry Bags
Price: 58.00

Description

We made this spill-proof cosmetic case so every makeup-lover can stay super organized wherever they bring their beauty rituals. Far away from home? No worries—comes with a mirror for en route touch-ups! And you won’t have to leave any of your favorite products behind because this makeup case has PLENTY of storage. Plus a removable brush holder that pops out (because no one wants to flip back and forth between cheeks and lips). Translation: nail your eye makeup wherever you roam.
Specifications
Dims: 9.5"W x 4"H x 7"D
Materials:
Body - PU
Trim - nylon zippers, PVC
Lining - Poly with water resistant finish
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 1.38lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
- exterior features easy to wipe clean faux leather
- easy to carry handle with BÉIS logo
- double U-zip open/closure
INTERIOR
- easy to wipe clean, durable, lining
- removable brush holder with hidden magnets (easy to grab on and stick back on) holds several brushes, easy to clean PVC material with flap to protect delicate brushes, elastic closure, long zip pocket on back
- slip pocket with removable mirror for touch-ups on the go
- one long slip pocket & two small slip pockets
PERFECT FOR
-Organizing cosmetics
-Makeup brushes
-All the hair ties
